EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Register to Win a LEGO Police Dropship | $200K Savings in Garland, Texas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Unearthing a Dev Lab, VDI, & $200K Savings in Garland, Texas October 22, 2014 | 12 p.m. EST | 11 a.m. CT | 5 p.m. GMT
Register to Win a LEGO® Super Secret Police Dropship!
<http://www.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-garland-texas/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=garland&utm_content=101014> <http://www.ci.garland.tx.us/>The City of Garland in northeast Texas is home to some 230,000 people – the 12th largest city in the state and 88th in the country. Each of Garland’s 40 municipal departments – Police, Fire, Public Safety, Parks, Court, etc. – are served from a single data center. In this webinar, you’ll catch a complete demonstration of VMTurbo® Operations Manager <http://vmturbo.com/product/operations-management-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=garland&utm_content=101014>, and learn of Garland’s story including:
- The unique challenges of managing an organizationally siloed IT infrastructure and how Garland overcame them - The challenge of properly provisioning hardware in an abstracted virtualized estate, from server to the underlying storage - How City of Garland uses VMTurbo to eliminate contention performance issues, maximize up-time and maintain a healthy state for its municipalities - The power of reporting to convey that business units’ and departments’ resource needs are being consistently met - How City of Garland leveraged VMTurbo to save more than $200K in its first year of deployment
All attendees of this webinar will be entered into a live drawing for a LEGO®™ Movie 70815 Super Secret Police Dropship Building Set <http://www.lego.com/en-us/movie/products/products/70815-super-secret-police-dropship> valued at $79.99 USD! Register Now <http://www.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-garland-texas/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=garland&utm_content=101014> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
